infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: DebsMatch needs access to your photo library to let you add and manage profile photos, and attach screenshots as report evidence.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: DebsMatch may save edited or processed photos to your library when you choose to do so.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: DebsMatch needs camera access if you choose to take a new photo.

plugins.photosPermission: DebsMatch needs access to your photo library to let you add and manage profile photos, and attach screenshots as report evidence.
plugins.cameraPermission: DebsMatch needs camera access if you choose to take a new photo.
